go-mssqlclrgeo
============

A deserializer and serializer for geography and geometry data type of Microsoft SQL Server.


WKB
---------------------
Can also convert from WKB (Well-known binary) to SQL Server CLR type.
Currently support theses types:

- Point
- LineString
- Polygon
- MultiPoint
- MultiLineString
- MultiPolygon
- GeometryCollection
- CircularString

To do
---------------------
- geometry validation
